statements: UPDATE research_misconduct SET investigation_status = 'Complete' WHERE allegation_id = 1;
UPDATE research_misconduct SET allegation_description = 'Fabrication of Data' WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE research_misconduct SET allegation_description = 'Plagiarism', investigator_name = 'Dr. Smith', investigation_status = 'Under Investigation' WHERE allegation_id = 1;
UPDATE research_misconduct SET investigator_name = 'Prof. Johnson', allegation_date = '2022-08-15', allegation_description = 'Fabrication', investigation_status = 'Closed' WHERE allegation_id = 2;
UPDATE research_misconduct_allegations SET allegation_description = 'Fabrication of data', date_reported = '2022-10-15' WHERE allegation_id = 1;
UPDATE research_investigations SET findings = 'Research misconduct confirmed' WHERE allegation_id = 1 AND investigation_id = 3;
UPDATE research_misconduct_allegations SET allegation_description='Fabrication of research data', researcher_id=101, date_reported='2022-10-15' WHERE allegation_id=1;
UPDATE research_investigations SET findings='Research misconduct confirmed, sanctions imposed', investigation_end_date='2022-11-30', investigation_start_date='2022-09-20' WHERE allegation_id=2;
UPDATE research_misconduct SET misconduct_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE misconduct_id = 1;
UPDATE research_institutions SET institution_country = 'United States', institution_address = '1234 Oak Street' WHERE institution_id = 2;
UPDATE research_institutions SET institution_address='123 Main Street', institution_country='USA' WHERE institution_id=1;
UPDATE research_misconduct SET misconduct_description='Fabricated data found during investigation', misconduct_date='2022-03-15' WHERE misconduct_id=5;
UPDATE ResearchInstitutions SET location='New Location' WHERE institution_id=1;
UPDATE Researchers SET department='Research Department' WHERE researcher_id=2;

UPDATE Researchers SET department = 'Engineering' WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';

UPDATE ResearchInstitutions SET institution_name = 'New Institution Name' WHERE institution_id = 1;
UPDATE Investigations SET investigation_outcome = 'Misconduct Confirmed', investigator_name = 'John Doe' WHERE investigation_id = 2;
